Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Suite in G minor, HWV 451

c. 1703–1706

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 5' 30"

  • 1. Allemande
  • 2. Courante

The suite comprises only an allemande and courante; the other movements are either lost or were never written.

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/19 · BA 4043 · Einzeln überlieferte Instrumentalwerke II · ed. Terence Best

1. Allemande

The allemande is also used in the suite in D minor (HWV 449).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

2. Courante

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2
